title: Discussing an upcoming video game release
context: Express extreme excitement for a game launching next week.

content.bestLine: I'm beyond hyped for this game, it's going to be lit!

neutral.text: The new game is coming out next week
I'm looking forward to the game launch
The game's release is highly anticipated
Next week can't come soon enough
The game is going to be a game-changer
I've been waiting for this game for months
I'm excited to see the game's features

informal.text: I'm so stoked for this game
This game is going to be sick
I've been counting down the days
The game's going to be a blast
This game is my most anticipated release
I'm ready to play all night
The game's community is going to be lit

slang.text: Yaaas, this game is going to be fire
I'm low-key obsessed with this game
The game's graphics are straight flames
I'm high-key excited for the game's release
This game is the real MVP
I'm deadass ready to play this game

patterns.template: This game is going to be [options]

dialogs.description: Two friends discussing the game launch

lines.speaker: Friend 1
lines.text: I'm beyond hyped for this game, it's going to be lit!

lines.speaker: Friend 2
lines.text: I know, right? I've been counting down the days

dialogs.description: A group of friends reacting to the game's trailer

lines.speaker: Friend 1
lines.text: Yaaas, this game is going to be fire

lines.speaker: Friend 2
lines.text: I'm low-key obsessed with this game

lines.text: The game's graphics are straight flames
